Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Protects the right of privacy of victims of sex offenses or offenses involving the transmission of HIV who are under the age of 18
Summary: Protects the right of privacy of victims of sex offenses or offenses involving the transmission of the HIV virus, who are under the age of 18; provides that the gender and address of victims under the age of eighteen be kept confidential.
LawCode: Amd ยง50-b, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to protecting the right of privacy of victims of sex offenses or offenses involving the transmission of the human immunodeficiency virus, under the age of eighteen, by prohibiting the disclosure of certain characteristics
